items.content_html: OfficeVibe is a lightweight communication app for colleagues to share informal messages, plan tea breaks, and foster a friendly office atmosphere. Keep the team connected effortlessly with this simple and easy-to-use app.

items.content_html: This repository hosts a lightweight SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implemented in JavaScript. SMTP is the standard protocol for sending email messages across networks. This server is designed for educational and testing purposes, providing a simple and easy-to-understand implementation of the SMTP protocol's core functionalities.
items.title: hmshuv/SMTP_Server_Project: This repository hosts a lightweight SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implemented in JavaScript. SMTP is the standard protocol for sending email messages across networks. This server is designed for educational and testing purposes, providing a simple and easy-to-understand implementation of the SMTP protocol's core functionalities.
